docs.text: SMS Api InterIntel Bulk SMS Api making requests all api calls are POST requests the content body is json all api responses are json authentication constants parameters to include in all requests CHID = 4; gateway_host = URL; api access parameters username password api key variable parameters timestamp = unix timestamp ip_address = HOST; lat = '0.0'; lng = '0.0'; endpoints /api/SEND SMS params MSISDN message recipient message the message to send scheduled_send format = "17/09/2016 6:31 am" (d/m/Y H:M (am/pm)) /api/get-my-host/ this is the only endpoint accepting GET please note that it must end in a slash the response from this endpoint is what is expected in variable parameters sample response { lat: 1, ip: 196.207.161.192 , lng: 38 } response the response will contain the following keys "response_status" only status of 00 is a success "response" message accombining the status Sample implementatations can be got from the samples folder
docs.title: SMS Api

docs.text: all api calls are POST requests the content body is json all api responses are json
docs.title: making requests

docs.text: constants parameters to include in all requests CHID = 4; gateway_host = URL; api access parameters username password api key variable parameters timestamp = unix timestamp ip_address = HOST; lat = '0.0'; lng = '0.0';
